Selected Answer: B
Answer here is "no". Simply deploying the modules does not solve the requirement to configure modules while the device is offline.

See https://github.com/Azure/iotedge/blob/main/edge-agent/README.md

ConfigSource

May be set to "twin" or "local". When set to "twin", the edge device twin is used as a configuration source for modules. When set to "local", a file (config.json) is used as a configuration source for modules.

A custom configuration JSON file can be used by bind mounting a directory containing the custom configuration file into the edge agent container and specifying the path to the configuration file in the container using the LocalConfigPath environment variable.

DeviceConnectionString must be set to a device connection string if ConfigSource is set to "twin".
LocalConfigPath

Path to the custom configuration JSON file used as the configuration source in the "local" mode.
